this_title: Damon and Hunter: Doing It Together
introduction: Comstock Films offers a genuinely new vision of couples' sexuality in this groundbreaking series of explicit documentary-style features of real-life lovers. Damon and Hunter: Doing it Together takes an intimate look inside the personal relationship of rising adult stars Damon DeMarco and Hunter James.Take an intimate look inside the personal relationship of Damon DeMarco and Hunter James in Comstock Films' first gay feature.The couple's sex scene was shot on actual film and mastered in HiDef anamorphic widescreen for 16x9 televisions, and features a multi-angle making-of featurette with optional audio commentary from husband and wife filmmakers Tony and Peggy Comstock.
foreign_title: Damon and Hunter: Doing It Together
